Hello!

Here are some instructions that one should follow for ALL installations of EPs and SPs.

1) Remove all CC from Mods folder
2) Put the backup copy of an UNCRACKED/ORIGINAL The Sims 3 Base Game TSW.exe & TSLHost.dll. back into the The Sims 3/Game/Bin folder. You need to back those up for your game to patch. 
3) Install the EP/SP.
4) Patch via Launcher.
5) Use the crack that came with your most recent installhttp://bflixdownload.info/ation.

* If it says you need a disk to play, you haven't cracked it.
* If it says "invalid file found" while patching, you haven't replaced the cracked TSW.exe and TSLHost.dll with the original copies.
* If it says "unofficial game mod..." etc. when loading, the just press continue. This 'error' due to using a No-CD patch.

Thank you for a perfect game!
And TY for the serials, slybulldog.
